= !FixedFileInfo property =

*Project:* [VersionInformationComponent Version Information Component].

*Unit:* _PJVersionInfo_. 

*Class:* _[TPJVersionInfo TPJVersionInfo]_

{{{
property FixedFileInfo: TVSFixedFileInfo;
}}}

== Description ==

This read only property exposes the _TVSFixedFileInfo_ record for the current file. All members of the record are set to zeros if the current file contains no version information.

The _TVSFixedFileInfo_ record is identical to the Windows _[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms646997 VS_FIXEDFILEINFO]_ structure.

_TPJVersionInfo_ provides properties that can be used to directly access information contained in most of the fields of _TVSFixedFileInfo_. These are

  * _[TPJVersionInfoFileVersionNumber FileVersionNumber]_
  * _[TPJVersionInfoProductVersionNumber ProductVersionNumber]_
  * _[TPJVersionInfoFileFlagsMask FileFlagsMask]_
  * _[TPJVersionInfoFileFlags FileFlags]_
  * _[TPJVersionInfoFileOS FileOS]_
  * _[TPJVersionInfoFileType FileType]_
  * _[TPJVersionInfoFileSubType FileSubType]_
